songs.lyrics:
Rockin’ It Lyrics[Fearless Four]
Ahhh... Fearless Four... Well, I'll be back for more...
They're here!
DLB (hu huh hah ha)
Tito (ha hah, ha hah)
Mike C (hey girl, hey girl)
Peso...

(D-L-B's) rockin it rockin it yes he is rockin it
(Tito's) rockin it yes he is rockin it
(Mike C!) rockin it yes he is rockin it (ha hu-hah!)
(Peso!) rockin it yes he is rockin it
We're all rockin it you should be rockin it, rockin it... rockin it
Don't, don't fight or fuss
If, you, wanna rock with us
Our talent's with us, so with us leave your trust
Get to the show train cab or bus cause we're
Rockin it rockin it yes we are rockin it, rockin it... rockin it

Yeah! Hah ha-hah ha-hah!
Wassup baby?

You know par-tay people we are back again
With a sure shot win
But we're much more better than we were back then
Not that we were before, but yo we gets more
(As long as the return is of the Fearless Four)
Featuring DLB, Tito, and Mike C
And Peso -- hah, and we won't S-T-O-P
'Cause see we'll tell ya from the top that our crew won't stop
(So let the bells jing-a-ling and let the champagne pop!)
Oh it's a celebration
Sort of a dedication, to all our fans throughout the nation
Who send in their letters and dial in on a cord
(And for all the newcomers just getting on board)
Who wanna rock with us and turn the party out
Well we wanna know what the Fearless is all about
Why don't ya come along with us, if ya wanna scream and shout
And especially come if you have no doubt that we're
Rockin it... rockin it
You might also likeNow, goin' one-by-one
Individually we'll rhyme to expand the fun
So clear yourself from the launchin pad as we blast off
We'll begin with the first, and end with the fourth
As we're rockin it (rockin it y'all) rockin it

[DLB]
My skills, will climb, when I start, to rhyme
And I'm always guaranteed to be on time
You're like me, you got good taste just look at my bod' and face
Microphone wizard is in the race and I am in first place
'Cause anyway I am the best on top of East West
DLB's on top of all of the rest when I'm
Rockin it... rockin it

[Tito]
You know the rhymes are so bad when they come to me
I'll make your fans step forward, and other rappers flee
Ask me about my skills and I'll reply top shelf, ha ha ha
To tell the truth, well I amaze myself, hey how
Am I so good, well I really don't know
But I know that there's no other, quite like Tito when I'm
Rockin it... rockin it

[Mike C]
Well I'm a million dollar boy and a billion dollar man
And if you got it I can get it with a wave of my hand
Got a voice so nice never say rhymes twice
Never have to explain, because I'm so precise
And if you ever wanna battle, you better prevent
The Mighty Mike C! MC President when I'm
Rockin it... rockin it
[Peso]
Well let's get right down to the bottom of things
We're here to get you on the floor with the music we bring
Smurf it out, shake bake and rattle n roll
Dance to the jazzy rhymes of the Great Peso
Comin out like a winner from the startin gate
Endin up like a champ you know, so great
I may be last on the line, but I'm one of the best
Can't you hear, my rhymes are funky fresh when I'm
Rockin it... rockin it

And we're rockin it... rockin it
And you're rockin it... rockin it

[Fearless Four]
Now, even as we play
There's a new wave of sound goin' on today
We know your time is very precious so we won't stall
We'll just put some words together and tell you all
How we're Rockin it...(rockin it y'all) Rockin it

It's the computer rhyme, a new electrical shock
Consisting of weird noises all around the clock
But of course music plays along cause it's a must
So let us tell you who does all of this for us
(O.C) He stands up behind the strong
(O.C) He keeps the beat on time for so long
(O.C) Goes along dance, rhyme or song
(O.C) The Master won't steer you wrong when he's
Rockin it... rockin it!

(Crazy Eddie) In my opinion, no.1 protege
(Crazy Eddie) There ain't a record that he can't play
(Crazy Eddie) See him once and I know you'll say
(Crazy Eddie) Can hold his ground against any DJ when he's
Rockin it... rockin it!

Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!
Yeah! Yeah! Yeah! Yeah! Yeah!
Oh yeah? OH YEAHEmbed

songs.full_title: Night of the Living Baseheads by Public Enemy
songs.title: Night of the Living Baseheads

songs.lyrics:
Problems Of The World (Today) Lyrics[Intro]
Problems of the world today!
Oh gee there's problems again!
I've got a headache!!

[Verse 1: DLB]
I'm living just to die without any feelings
So I wait here for my maker 'til it's time to go
Ask someone about the time and slip in "Can you spare a dime"?
For asking where I heard it, I just don't know
I need someone to talk to to try to ease some pressure
Off my mind because times are rough nowadays
I got a high school diploma and I'm very ambitious
So why oh why do I live this way?
These things called computers does the thinking for a man
Leaving one man all the buttons while unemployed again
Should have trained with computers in some college course
So when I play the game of life just maybe I'd win
With the...
(Problem!) Education!
(Problem!) Unemployment!
(Problem!) We got too many!
(Problems of the world today!)
[Verse 2: Tito]
Daddy we had fun the weekend that just passed
Mommy's brother came to visit while you were away
I know why you look puzzled, I was shocked myself
I didn't know I had an uncle until Friday
I was really glad I met him, but places Mommy pet him
Brought them both the ugly faces so they went in the back
Thought it was kinda crazy but I know as a fact
That there's no way in the world I'd kiss my sister like that
What do you mean she has no brother?
I saw himself, and we can go check with mother just to see what she'll say
Thought you would be glad to know I had an uncle
Didn't know you'll come home and beat my mommy that way
(Problem!) Adultery!
(Problem!) Jealous even!
(Problem!) We got too many!
(Problems of the world today!)

[Verse 3: Mike C]
She woke up, there was no milk, so she went to the store
Leaving her son alone in the house that day
Never crossed her mind that something could go wrong
Think of the man before you owe it on the joke and play
When she returned home tears fled from her eyes
As she witnessed her son laid out on the floor
The man stood above him with a black leather strap
And she grabbed a butcher knife and said "Don't hit him anymore"
The neighbors called the cops and the boy survived
But that experience will always leave his mind in gloom
And if you wanna meet the man who would do such a thing
He lives rent free locked in his rubber room, with mental
(Problem!) Child abusin'!
(Problem!) He got too many!
(Problem!) He got to solve them!
(Problems of the world today!)
You might also like[Verse 4: Peso]
I wanna be somebody can you understand that?
You see I'm livin' two lives I go to work and school
My friends say I'm crazy to try so hard
Instead of being with my girl I must be some fool
If I quit my school there goes an education
Which leaves me no pull in my future world
And if I walk from a job, can I afford a T
For myself or her, I may lose my girl
After working and reading the things, they're ug
See I need to take uppers just to make love
I think about to fall flat on my face
And send high praise to the man above
(Problem!) Relationships!
(Problem!) Strenuous!
(Problem!) Got too many!
(Problems of the world today!)

[Bridge]
Hey yo, what's up fellas, man
Yo man I just got laid off last week (What?)
Man, you think it's bad for him
My girl just left me, for what could have been a homeboy
(You know how that goes G, you know how that goes)
Yo homeboy, that's just a few of the problems of the world today
Word!
[Verse 5: DLB]
Next door is the big house that's owned by the Jones'
To a little brown shack that's owned by me
I get so mad every time that I see him
So I guess deep down that's called envy
I walk out every morning 'fore I drive in my car
The old horse and buggy I should say it is
Compared to the new car of Mr. Jones
When my car is 12 years older than his
I'll just live in my house and I'll be alright
And the old Cadillac still gets me around
While I lift the phonograph and listen to a song
Titled don't let the Jones' get you down
(Problem!) Jealousy!
(Problem!) Envious!
(Problem!) Got too many!
(Problems of the world today!)

[Verse 6: Tito]
On the park bench people pointin' their fingers
Talkin' about everyone that walks down the street
They pose as they your friends to get into your business
But they start investigatin' from the time you meet
The tell this one more truth, sit and tell you what they said
And that's the way he-say-she-say starts
And then comes the fight for armed by the lives, so
And the nosybodies just forgets their parts
I live quite secluded, I keep to myself
I only tell people what I want them to know
Although I get friendly, I won't get personal
Because one never knows who's friend or foe
(Problem!) Struck dope!
(Problem!) Backstabbin'!
(Problem!) Got too many!
(Problems of the world today!)

[Verse 7: Mike C]
Sittin' on the street corner to earn a fast buck
Paranoid of the police because of what I sell
Keep a low profile and hidin' my product
Because if I'm caught, then here comes hell
Spending hours getting booked and my bail let out
And I hope my Legal Aid lawyer don't fail
I mean as my mouthpiece at my court date
'Cause I can get from one to five in jail
As I start to think about it, I should leave this mess
Turn law and get a job because I know that I can
A 9 to 5 looks good, but so does the streets
And man doesn't rule money, but money rules man!
(Problem!) Paranoid!
(Problem!) Tough decision!
(Problem!) Got too many!
(Problems of the world today!)

[Verse 8: Peso]
That girl over there has a fair money status
But she always stealin' something when you turn your back
She needs someone's attention, most likely it's her parents
So from being ignored, she's a kleptomaniac
The things she may steal she could afford to buy 'em
But the girls so sick, she'll grab in a wink
Although I and I can't understand that
She'll take anything and all except the kitchen sink
Why can't her parents understand her? At least try to
With professional help, she'll be alright
That is the turn in the better direction so maybe she won't pick up everything in sight
(Problem!) Neglected!
(Problem!) Klepto!
(Problem!) Got too many!
(Problems of the world today!)Embed

annotatable.link_title: It’s Magic by The Fearless Four
annotatable.title: It's Magic

songs.full_title: Was Dog a Doughnut? by Cat Stevens
songs.title: Was Dog a Doughnut?

songs.lyrics:
It’s Magic LyricsI summon all mystical powers
To join me in a ritual
To prove that not only
The hand is quicker than the eye
But that the mouth is quicker than the ear

Say "hocus pocus" and we will appear
1, 2, 3, 4 kids without fear
It's a night of illusions just to state it clear
From all the words and headlines from front to rear
It's magic, that will make our talents rise
It's magic, but not apparent to eyes
It's magic, not known to any other emcee
It's magic, of course what else could it be?

While the statements we make could be conceited and grim
But what is normal to us is an illusion to them

It's magic

[All]
You got the devastating

[Tito]
Tito that's me
And I won't even give a clue of my ability
Don't think that I really have nothing to say
'Cause I'm so good you have to see it to believe it anyway

[All]
You got the Mighty

[Mike C]
Mike C most definitely
I'm somewhat of a Merlin of this time you see
You know that I'm number one and I'm not saying nothing funny
And I'll give Houdini a run for his money
You might also like[All]
And there's the Great

[Peso]
Peso you all should know
I make girls levitate, make a black wall glow
To a life that's right putting planes in flight
And that's just a little sample of all my might

[All]
Say boil and bubble, toil and trouble and that's the call
So you have

[DLB]
The greatest microphone wizard of all
Emcees are ordinary so with that I'm through
From now on I will be known as M.W

(D-L-B) The microphone wizard, y'all
(He's DLB) The spell to start the ball

Shazam!

Well I could rock a rhyme from the time nine to six
You know that I could do the same if only I had the mix
Yeah, but I could wave my hand and part the sea
But I could wink my eyes and have the girls come to me
And I could write as many lines as your little heart desire
And each and every one of us could set you on fire
I could be falling and stop in mid-air
Yeah, but I could snap my fingers and make you lose your hair
I could make you think I'm walking but I won't move an inch
And I'm the wizard of them all and that's a cinch
Well either way you wanna slice it neither one of us is playin'
And if you want we'll turn a handkerchief right into a can
And as I stand here I'll dematerialize
I keep a clap and become ten times my size
With a twitch of my nose I turn winter to spring
And turn summer to fall like it ain't no thing
Not like any other ordinary emcee
Who say how mystical and magical they may be
First we'll sock a groove to ya, then we'll prove to ya
Then only our magic is the kind that will move ya
Whether dancing or singing, rhyming or illusion
It's performed in your face, we could cause some confusion
It's magic, that will make our talents rise
It's magic, but not apparent to eyes
It's magic, not known to any other emcee
It's magic, of course what else could it be?

While the statements we make could be conceited and grim
But what is normal to us is an illusion to them

It's magic

Our grand finale starts off with a pow
To let the people know the secrets of our know-how
To say we have ESP would stretch the truth too far
So to make it plain and simple we have ESR
That's "extra special rhymes" that keeps us on top
In other words we'll succeed while other emcees flop
And along with us here on our mystical ride
Who keeps the Four in line with the social stride
The two of which all of us can confide
For the DJs we have are qualified
To make a cut so fast that you can't eye
Anything our DJ might apply
Well to your ear tonight and then to now
With a trick on the mix so you have pure sound
Well a magical force field surrounds the Four
But it's gonna fade out in a minute or more
But you know the magic words to bring us back to you
'Cause when the field fades out we'll fade out, too
That's right and I'm sorry that we're leaving my friend
But to make up for that we'll let you do the end
Now just repeat every word that will come to your ear
And like a genie in the bottle we will all disappear
Now you heard it's magic earlier in the rhyme
Now just repeat "it's magic", but make it on time

It's magic, that will make our talents rise
It's magic, but not apparent to eyes
It's magic, not known to any other emcee
It's magic, of course what else could it be?

While the statements we make could be conceited and grim
But what is normal to us is an illusion to themEmbed

songs.title: Problems Of The World (Today)

songs.lyrics:
Fearless Freestyle Lyrics[Intro]
Well you told me to, you told me to, you told me to

[Verse 1: DLB]
Yes, yes y'all, and you just won't stop
We're gonna rock the beat 'til we hit the top
Party people, whether you like it or not
DLB is gonna rock this whole darn spot
Like that y'all and you just won't quit
'Cause DLB is on top of it
As my rhyming momentum proceeds to elevate
Puttin' me on a platform a step beyond great
Any other MC will regurgitate
'Cause they just can't swallow what I regulate
And we spin sure shot rhyme up on flight
If you want to rock a party on a Friday night
Or on a Saturday, just if you may
Excuse my expression, I meant to say
Keep rhyme on hand stay in command
People in the place please try to understand
An experience with me will split your hair
Because in any situation you'll find me there
Like this, the mack is so log, close to at the roller
Million dollar song and I've written by Zolar
The way I crush MCs I could be your molar
'Cause I'm the real thing just like Coca-Cola
Backbone of the team and I will make you scream
As versatile as a thing they call ice cream
In a bowl, on a cone, a la mode, all alone
Slow rhyming funky beats on the microphone
If were a motorcycle, 50,000 cc's
Description of the power of rhymes like these
So kick out the spark, pull the bottle, let's go
Give the rapper a chance to rock the show
You see the way I tell lies I could get away with murder (Ha ha)
The way I switch rhymes I could be a converter
Be Vidal Sassoon and I will split his ends
And that's just where the fun begins
Make Brooke Shields throw her Calvins out in the cold
And wear DLB jeans 'til she's gray and old
'Cause I'll hug her just right, move at the slightest might
Won't pinch every inch 'cause her tight butt's light
Like the Italian Stallion when I'm in combat
Make you think I'm gonna lose, but it ain't really like that
Let you throw it to the dome piece, one times three
Then receive a KO, which was delivered by me
Make Felix Unger sloppy and come to dinner late
Make Uncle Ben's think Carolina is great
For all the knuckleheads for whom I must be precise
Uncle Ben's and Carolina are competitive rice
And then the things I've been said was switched around
By DLB because I have imperial sound
So rock on and a, rock on and a
Keep the beat until the early morn' and a
Go do-re-mi-fa-so-la-Tito!
[Verse 2: Tito]
Not a MC lawyer, or an employer
But better known as Tito the MC destroyer
I will abolish, wax and polish
MCs in the place I will demolish
Take it from me, this advice is for free
Don't you ever get stupid and wanna battle me
'Cause my mouth is a commander
My brain is the demander
From my point of view this is where I stand a
Talented and clever, we took it now never
Yes, got what it takes, not about heartaches
I got more juice than Tropicana makes
Yes that's what I said, or haven't you read
I'm not only good at rhymin', I'm good in bed
I'm one of a kind, Gemini's my sign
My Zodiac will attract over 109
Confident, reverent, that much is true
Nominated, well-liked, what else is new
About ready I'm sure, I will endure
On the mic you'll like is The Fearless Four
Devastating that's me, well I'm part of the show
Listen up all you ladies 'cause I want you to know
I'm well developed in the mind and I wanna spend time
Sincere, don't fear, 'cause I wanna combine
Put all of our thoughts and inside feelings
Just want to know just who I'm dealin'
With because, the question is was
You that clever (Clever), to know that never (Never)
That we'd be free to do whatever
Your mind was blown the very first time
But when I ask you for a date you put me on the line
You said would it really matter
If we sit and chatter
We'll talk about me and you and that's that-a
We'll take it nice and steady girl and you won't regret it
You do me a favor, why don't you just let it
Rock on and a, on and on and on
Until the early mornin' (Mornin')
Mike C, see my man you got to
Get on the mic and do the best you can
You might also like[Verse 3: Mike C]
Ha now it's the MC bigger the MC lord
You know they say you need the for to get you on the floor
And now that you know that it's the place to be
Well let me introduce myself, well I'm the mighty Mike C
Known for my bars, an MC star
Keep rhymes on time and up to par
And I'll never bite, 'cause it's not polite
And instead of fight, I'd rather recite
My poetry, that makes me an MC
I'll rhyme, he'll mix, the Master OC
Slice and dice, and it sounds so precise
Other duck DJs ask him for advice
They'll praise his name and they'll drink champagne
The name of the game is to aim for fame
But the story behind the Four is the mind
Of DLB, he's so young, so fine
Tito got the looks of a Spanish prince
But girls around his heart there's a golden fence
And Peso, the greatest there in the parts of the eighth
But you still can't rake what he creates
Crazy Eddie's on the mix, the heads do turn
His hands get awkward, the wheels start to burn
But as for me, well I'm the mighty Mike C
The lover of all the ladies' like masterpiece
And I can get a mayor to put me on welfare
'Cause I don't care, girl I'm a millionaire!
So you could step to the back, girl, 'cause you watch out
Because it takes time to know what Mike C is about
(A mighty Mike C) rock the funky beat y'all
(The mighty Mike C) I rock the funky beat y'all
Check one, check two, since you know what to do
Peso, cold crush wanna give it to you
[Verse 4: Peso]
It doesn't matter where I'm at, the scene will always rock
With the energetic rhymin' of the future shock
Generatin' and creatin' clientele by the stock
To be a lover, undercover on and off the clock
Now you're asking yourself who I may be
Know me dearly, I'm sincerely, I'm the Captain P
And the rhymes that I say, is bound to give you a twirl
The commodore with something more that possess the world
On top of that I had to reach my peak
I'm going higher and higher every time I speak
So don't get me wrong, you'll say I'm right
I'll get you loose if your body's tight
I'll play in the day, romance in the night
Have girls calling me their Guiding Light
I'm not a gigolo, a Romeo, this can you also know
I'm not a Casanova, I'm just the great Peso
Sagittarius I throw on this Zodiac list
The sign of fire and desire others can't resist
When it comes to any jam you know the girls won't miss
To see the Fearless Four MCs, the Fearless Four
To see the Fearless Four MCs is something I won't miss
DLB, impress the ladies, um
(Show 'em that your better) (What?)
(Show 'em that your better)
(Show 'em that your better than any love letter) (Huh?)
(Show 'em that your better than any MC)1Embed

songs.full_title: F-4000 by The Fearless Four
songs.title: F-4000
songs.embed_content: Read “F-4000” by The Fearless Four on Genius

album.full_title: Problems Of The World by The Fearless Four
album.name: Problems Of The World

songs.lyrics:
F-4000 Lyrics[Intro]
F-4000
F-4000
We're gonna rock

[Verse 1]
Now from the Fearless safe of sure shots
Here's something computerized and new
The title is F-4000 and we have conceived it just for you
Never in time could you find a groove
That would do so much for your mind
A groove that would soothe and then make you move
So if you don't believe it we're ready to proove
Everything we say to you today
Although it doesn't really have to be that way
Because you soar on the floor, could mean nothing more
Than knowing that this side is from the Fearless Four
Thousand
F-4000
Now let's rock
Rock it
Party people get down

[Verse 2]
While the music enters your ears and moves to your feet
Let me describe this fleet that can't be beat
As my plot to prolong the fun
I'll introduce them one by one
The devastating, Tito
Quick on the draw when it comes to the rhyme
Precise in wording diction on the dime
Take an idea from way, way back
And bring it up to date to make contact
And when he decides to go for the kill
No other rapper can match his skill
The mighty, Mike C
Look at the the blink of his eye, the shuffle of his feet
The wave of his hand when the man is here
He'll bring a smile on to everyone's face
From right to left from front to rear
He's our Simon Says when it comes to a party
For at his command comes life from dead
He's the president rappers respect him
Bow at his feet and kiss his hand
The Great Peso
He's our anchorman with the master plan
And a 200 bank of rhymes on hand
He's especially designed, poetically inclined
To make up a rhyme and take command
He used to make up rhymes just for a hobby
And another lead way to have some fun
Ask any rapper after battling him
They'll say when it came to fun they had none
The microphone wizard, D.L.B
Hey y'all that's me
I complete the Four with a touch that's more
Although mysterious and laid back
Don't you threaten me with competition
Because I don't give any slack
The microphone wizard is my title
And I must live up to it
I'll take two creations of my own
Good enough to make any rapper quit
God of the pod of this brand of peas
That just happens to be named emcees
Move out of the way, step back please
Soon you'll see the D.L.B
You might also like[Outro]
Gonna rock the house, party people
Get up, rock the beat
Get down, it's complete
Crazy Eddie, rock the beat y'all
Master O.C. on top of them all
Let's rock

Fearless...4000Embed

songs.full_title: Dedication by The Fearless Four
songs.title: Dedication
songs.embed_content: Read “Dedication” by The Fearless Four on Genius

album.full_title: Street Sounds Electro 7 by Various Artists
album.name: Street Sounds Electro 7

songs.lyrics:
Dedication Lyrics[Intro]
This is for our fans
This is for our fans
This is for our fans
A dedication!
We're in the studio most of the time
Pouring talent out of our minds
Trying to create a rap that will please you once more
(Is that hard?)
Not saying that is hard for us to do
But we want to let you know we think of you
So this time it's a dedication from The Fearless Four
(Ok fellas)
[Verse 1]
Now we'll take some time out
For the fans who looked out
Who stood for us and gave us all our clout
Our sole purpose is to give immerse
So they're the sole inspiration of what we're worth
For you don't forsake us, instead you make us
Even though you know you have power to break us
Instead you put your faith in The Fearless Four
So we'll work a little harder to give a lot more
So here's our situation that calls for dedication
On the west invitation for any nation
Accept this dedication from the Fearless
And if you haven't heard of us that means you'll hear less
Than the best off of our rap
So you never felt a real finger snap
Or a hand clap, or a foot tap
Because the booty of rap we tap!

[Bridge]
This is for our fans
A dedication!
Ooh-wee!
Wee!
Wee!
You might also like[Verse 2: D.L.B.]
Waiting in a nervous wreck backstage, now play it
Beat the old cliché the show must go on
May the spotlight hit me, you can't get me
Off of the stage 'til the early morn'
I'll excel in the music, and hope you use it
And the way to keep you from being tight
And if it doesn't hurt the party, uh, I'll work my body
In a way to make the ladies dream of me tonight
I'll admit that I like to sit at
The top of the throne 'cause the present I bought
Is the lyrical structure created by me
Dedicated to you, from D.L.B

[Bridge]
This is for our fans
A dedication!

[Verse 3: Tito]
My fans are my number one, I'm devoted to none
Other than these special people who make my job fun
And being that you care so much
These feelings I share, are such
Are stronger than the rest, 'cause there is a touch
Of love that never dies, the beholder is I
Frankly speaking being truthful you're the reason why
I'm here today and with you I'll stay
Special thanks to all my fans who made it that way
The support that you gave me is what made me
Trusted in me, and never betrayed me
Stood by my side, enhanced my pride
That's why I cherish your support 'til the day I die
[Bridge]
This is for our fans
A dedication!

[Verse 4: Mighty Mike C]
Yo man it's the rhyme hatcher, rhythm dispatcher
Girls throwin' kisses, you know that I'll catch 'em
Girl out there and this I swear
And before I leave, I'll own the chair
Or throne to be known in the MC zone
'Cause I made new threats on the microphone
Now am I fresh? Need not to ask
Well I'll take on any rapper at any test
Make rappers bow, make the ladies say "ow"
If you want a little proof just look around now
Long live the present, that present's me
Dedicated to you from the mighty Mike C!

[Bridge]
This is for our fans
A dedication!

[Verse 5: Peso]
This is from me to you my fans
You made me a superstar in this land
I received all your letters you sent to me
Now I'm sendin' one back with this jazzy piece
Now do something neat like moving your feet
And keep the pace up 'til the E-N-D
'Cause it's on, on, right on time
For the great Peso to say a rhyme
I'm five foot eleven, your gift from heaven
Rappin', movin' and groovin', always improvin'
It's such a way to keep you rockin' everyday
'Cause the Fearless, the players, is here to stay

[Refrain]
This is for our fans
A dedication!
We're in the studio most of the time
Pouring talent out of our minds
Trying to create a rap that will please you once more
(Is that hard?)
Not saying that is hard for us to do
But we want to let you know we think of you
So this time it's a dedication from The Fearless Four

[Verse 6]
The cause of our 'gregation is your total creation
Of a group on the stoop of the success, build it
Upright the fight 'cause the rap we write
Is always to the point and there's nothing bewildering
Plain comprehension of what we mention
If we stumble on a word we'll find an extension
And a rap to explain the meaning of the word
To make sure you understood what you just heard!
All that we did is done for you
Allow us to take this moment out to thank you
Well thanks to your support and all your good will
Thanks to your admiration, we are still
On the top and won't stop caring for you
This one is yours from the heart 'cause we love you

[Outro]
This is for our fans
This is for our fans (This is for our fans)
This is for our fans (This is for our fans)
This is for our fans (I'm talkin' about you)
This is for our fans (I'm talkin' about you and you)
This is for our fans (I'm talkin' about you and you and you and you and you and you and you and you and you and you)
This is for our fans
This is for our fans (Because of you
I'm here on top, don't wanna stop)
This is for our fans (Yeah, I appreciate it)
This is for our fans (I tell ya love you, I love you
I love you, love you, love you)
This is for our fans (I love you, I love you, I love you)
This is for our fans
This is for our fans (No, no)
This is for our fansEmbed

songs.lyrics:
Got To Turn Out LyricsAre you ready? (Yeah!) For the Fearless? (Yeah!)

[The Microphone Wizard DLB:] The Microphone Wizard DLB!
[Group:] He’s got to turn out, he’s got to turn out, he’s got to turn out, so turn on out!
[The Devastating Tito:] The Devastating Tito!
[Group:] He’s got to turn out, he’s got to turn out, he’s got to turn out, so turn on out!
[Mighty Mike C:] Hey, the Mighty Mike C!
[Group:] He’s got to turn out, he’s got to turn out, he’s got to turn out, so turn on out!
[The Great Peso:] Hey, the Great Peso!
[Group:] He’s got to turn out, he’s got to turn out! He’s got to turn out!
[Sung Chorus:]
We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out!
We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out!

[Verse 1: Group]
So listen: Party people, well bust a move
We have a little theory that we’d like to prove
The question of the matter is can we rock a groove
Or if the music is bound to soothe your desire to dance
So get ready, yo, ‘cause here we come
Now check out where we’re comin' from
And if you say no then you’re kinda dumb
'Cause we’re bad and that’s about the sum of things
All those in the place that ask who are we
I’m the Microphone Wizard DLB
The Devastating Tito
And as they turn out, the Mighty Mike C
And let me state that I’m the Great Peso
And we’ve got to turn out

Open the door we’ll give more fourth time up at bat
We are The Fearless Four, got to turn out

[Sung Hook:]
We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out! (Oh yes we have!)
We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out!
You might also like[Background ad libs:]
(Ho ho!)
(Yeah, ha huh ha, ha huh ha ha, huh huh huh ha, ha ha ha)
(The el baby, [?] function! function!)
([?] The master, the master, the master OC)
([?] and Krazy E)

[Group:] The Microphone Wizard DLB!

[Verse 2: The Microphone Wizard DLB]
Ooh, rhymes are hot tonight
Thus every rapper’s dream to try and turn out
Ladies are smokin’ in the place
Just by looking I’m damp from steam so I will break out
(Where would you go?) To try and dry off
You’d do the same if you knew how I felt for bein'
Such a sweet lover, rapper and a man
Like sugar when wet I melt, ooh
He’s got to turn out!

[Group:] The Devastating Tito! Turn on out!

[Verse 3: The Devastating Tito]
Success is what I want, a hard time is what I get
People think I’m not set, at least not yet
But I’m willing to bet that I’ll be a threat
And if you’re with me, girl, you won’t regret
'Cause you’ll be receivin' a feelin' of believin'
And when I start rhymin' there’s no chance of you leavin'
You’ll be applaudin', screamin' and shoutin'
No longer on the mic will you keep doubtin' Tito
[Group:] He’s got to turn out! The Mighty Mike C’s gonna turn on out!

[Verse 4: The Mighty Mike C]
Well I amaze the party people [?] is it the light
I’m like a milky white pigeon on a helluva flight
Just pushing my way day after day
I’ll make you keep coming after hearing me play
But to make a emcee rock you’ve got to give him some trust
You come to the party, leave the rockin' to us
Keeping my faith and not any doubt
'Cause when Mike C’s here, there’s no need to pout

[Group:] He’s got to turn out! (The Great Peso) Turn on out!

[Verse 5: The Great Peso]
Doesn’t matter where I’m at I seem to always rock
With the energetic rhymin' of a future shock
Generatin' and creatin' clientele by the stock
To be your lover undercover on and off the clock
Now you’re askin' yourself who I may be
Don’t be dilly, I’m your silly, I’m the capital P
And the rhymes that I say it’s bound to give you a twirl
The commodore with somethin' more that possess the world

[Group:]
Open the door we’ll give more fourth time up at bat
We are The Fearless Four, got to turn out

[Verse 6: Group]
There’s not an instrument in our hand
But we’re so so [?] a two-man band
Consistin' of turntables and a mixer at hand
So direct your attention to the duo in command
A M-A-S! T-E! R-O-C!
Has an endless supply of capability
No matter what kinda fade it’s always made
And we need him like a deck of cards needs a spade
So in other words our group is in the shade
So to protect him we need more than just a barricade
Our DJ has a protégé to keep the turntables ready
Compared to him any DJ would seem kinda tame
Well no one can stop him, dancing can’t top him
So brace yourselves and get ready
'Cause look it’s Eddie ya’ll, we give you much much more
He’s Crazy Eddie ya’ll, 'cause we’re the Fearless Four
Emcees ya’ll! Down to please ya’ll!
And we’ll rock you down to your knees ya’ll!

[Spoken Chorus:]
We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, turn on out! We’ve got to turn out!
We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out! We’ve got to turn out!
We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out! We’ve got to turn out!
We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out! We always turn out!

[Sung Chorus:]
We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out!
We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out!

We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out!
We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out!

We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out!
We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out!

We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out!
We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out!

We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out!
We got to turn out, we got to turn out, we got to turn out, so turn on out!Embed

annotatable.link_title: Just Rock by The Fearless Four
annotatable.title: Just Rock

songs.full_title: Cars by Gary Numan
songs.title: Cars

songs.lyrics:
Just Rock LyricsMommy, they're here again

We've come up with something new
That all the others can't mock
With funky music and a fresh rap and
We call it just rock, so just rock

And before we start it all, let's give our crew roll call
And since we've no time to stall we might as well start
With DLB, Tito, Mike C, Peso
With O.C. and Crazy Eddie
Our deejays for the show, so just rock
To the funky beat and smurf it up tough
Before you sink don't you quit until you all had enough
So just rock with the Fearless Four, the message we bring
Is as simple as the title of the song that we sing, so just rock
It's time to party y'all
So come on let's have a ball
'Cause we want to rock you all
Best keep it short
So just rock

We'll break off one at a time
For an individual rhyme
To show what we have and stuff
So let's all just rock

DLB, that is me the microphone wizard y'all
Just say if I can pass through one emcee
I'll pass through them all
'Cause I defeat when I compete
Something else is quite contrary
I'm the best just confess nothing else is necessary

Tito, by now you know my talents only elevate
There's no bad there's only good in the rhymes that I create
Since you're stable I'll be able just to make a little rhyme
Hold on tight I'll rock it right, give me a little time

Mike C, speaking of me the ladies say I'm doing fine
Well above in making love, let me lay that on the line
There's no cut no matter what that can take me off a rhyme
I'm so on I'll sing a song that sends a chill up your spine, haha
You might also likePeso, the romeo when I'm with these young ladies
I'm as snug as a bug and I'm ready for the 80's
This creation complication I'm about to invent
Is like a letter or better with a sweet cherry scent

Emcees that are we with a rhyming specialty
Whether he's with the keys, set your whole life free
There's one man with the plan, we can turn this party out
So just in case you lost your place let us all spell it out
F-E-A-R-L-E-double-S
Party people in the place, about time that you confess
That we shock and we rock and you know it's a fact
Satisfaction guaranteed or you can get your money back
So never fear when we're here it's a brand new year
And for a point if we're the joint do the Fearless Four cheer
Ho! Let's go!

At every show we have a musical source
That always tells us what to do just for your pleasure of course
They say just rock
O.C. always has the gift for people
Love to show life
He also makes sure that our wardrobe is as sharp as a knife
Well Crazy Eddie always know the beat that won't let them stop
But of course or how else could we get them to rock
So just rock, so just rock
Do everything I do and we'll have some fun
So listen close to these directions or you'll miss every one
And you won't rock
When we command say "Ho"
You say it, just break free
You may, it is all a game so play it
Come on let's try
Say ho, say ho, ho
Scream, say Fearless Four
Say Fearless Four
F-E-A-R-L-E-double-S, F-O-U-R
F-E-A-R-L-E-double-S, F-O-U-R
(Fearless Four!)
F-E-A-R-L-E-double-S, F-O-U-R
(Fearless Four!)
F-E-A-R-L-E-double-S, F-O-U-REmbed
